verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> this, <S%H2088><s%> O priests! <S%H3548><s%> Give <S%H7181><s%> heed, <S%H7181><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel! <S%H3478><s%> Listen, <S%H238><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of the king! <S%H4428><s%> For the judgment <S%H4941><s%> applies to you, For you have been <S%H1961><s%> a snare <S%H6341><s%> at Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> And a net <S%H7568><s%> spread <S%H6566><s%> out on Tabor. <S%H8396><s%>
And the revolters <S%H7846><s%> have gone <S%H6009><s%> deep <S%H6009><s%> in depravity, <S%H9597><s%> But I will chastise <S%H4148><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them.

I know <S%H3045><s%> Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> is not hidden <S%H3582><s%> from Me; For now, <S%H6258><s%> O Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> you have played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot, <S%H2181><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> has defiled <S%H2930><s%> itself.

Their deeds <S%H4611><s%> will not allow <S%H5414><s%> them To return <S%H7725><s%> to their God. <S%H430><s%> For a spirit <S%H7307><s%> of harlotry <S%H2183><s%> is within <S%H7130><s%> them, And they do not know <S%H3045><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Moreover, the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> testifies <S%H6030><s%> against <S%H6440><s%> him, And Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Ephraim <S%H669><s%> stumble <S%H3782><s%> in their iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> has stumbled <S%H3782><s%> with them.

They will go <S%H1980><s%> with their flocks <S%H6629><s%> and herds <S%H1241><s%> To seek <S%H1245><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> but they will not find <S%H4672><s%> [Him]; He has withdrawn <S%H2502><s%> from them.

They have dealt <S%H898><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%> against the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> For they have borne <S%H3205><s%> illegitimate <S%H2114><s%> children. <S%H1121><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> the new <S%H2320><s%> moon <S%H2320><s%> will devour <S%H398><s%> them with their land. <S%H2506><s%>

Blow <S%H8628><s%> the horn <S%H7782><s%> in Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> The trumpet <S%H2689><s%> in Ramah. <S%H7414><s%> Sound <S%H7321><s%> an alarm <S%H7321><s%> at Beth-aven: "Behind <S%H310><s%> you, Benjamin! <S%H1144><s%>"

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> a desolation <S%H8047><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of rebuke; <S%H8433><s%> Among the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> I declare <S%H3045><s%> what is sure. <S%H539><s%>

The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> have become <S%H1961><s%> like those who move <S%H5472><s%> a boundary; <S%H1366><s%> On them I will pour <S%H8210><s%> out My wrath <S%H5678><s%> like water. <S%H4325><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> is oppressed, <S%H6231><s%> crushed <S%H7533><s%> in judgment, <S%H4941><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> he was determined <S%H2974><s%> to follow <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> [man's] command. <S%H6673><s%>
Therefore I am like a moth <S%H6211><s%> to Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> And like rottenness <S%H7538><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

When Ephraim <S%H669><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> his sickness, <S%H2483><s%> And Judah <S%H3063><s%> his wound, <S%H4205><s%> Then Ephraim <S%H669><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Assyria <S%H804><s%> And sent <S%H7971><s%> to King <S%H4428><s%> Jareb. <S%H3377><s%> But he is unable <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> to heal <S%H7495><s%> you, Or to cure <S%H1455><s%> you of your wound. <S%H4205><s%>

For I [will be] like a lion <S%H7826><s%> to Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> And like a young <S%H3715><s%> lion <S%H3715><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%> I, even I, will tear <S%H2963><s%> to pieces and go <S%H1980><s%> away, I will carry <S%H5375><s%> away, and there <S%H369><s%> will be none <S%H369><s%> to deliver. <S%H5337><s%>

I will go <S%H1980><s%> away [and] return <S%H7725><s%> to My place <S%H4725><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> they acknowledge <S%H816><s%> their guilt <S%H816><s%> and seek <S%H1245><s%> My face; <S%H6440><s%> In their affliction <S%H9496><s%> they will earnestly <S%H7836><s%> seek <S%H7836><s%> Me.
